person.persName: Richard Sutton (Fleming County, Kentucky, laborer and farmer)

body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, laborer and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Tabitha J. Sutton. Father of Charles N. Sutton, Eli T. Sutton, Thomas D. Sutton, Hiram J. Sutton, and George M. Sutton. Laborer in Fleming County in 1850 and 1860. Farmer in Fleming County in 1863.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, District 1, p. 342.
